title: If Development Plan Reservations (excluding DP Road / Road widening) falls within or adjacent to the
clause_text: If Development Plan Reservations (excluding DP Road / Road widening) falls within or adjacent to the land of the same land owner under I to R provision, then such reservation may be adjusted in amenity space in the following manner :
